WorkItem.ClosedComment: You apparently didn't read the Optimizer documentation. It says to mark it with a Blue Gem if you don't want to reforge, regem and reenchant the item. Make sure it doesn't also have a Green gem on it, which you can check by going to the Available > Gear chart
WorkItem.Description:
I searched the documentation and forums and even googled "rawr restrict specific item reforge" and have found nothing on the subject, though I am sure the functionality is there, I'm just not bright enough to find it or figure it out on my own it seems.
 
I am building 4 sets of gear: arcane5, fire5, arcane raid, and fire raid. Arcane will be the primary raiding spec. All of the sets will feature 2 items that won't change and that I don't want to reforge/regem which would be the Dreamless Belt and Breeches of Mended Nightmares. Having no desire to drop another 8k gold to pick up a second set of each. I want to optimize those 2 pieces for arcane raiding and have the other three builds optimize around those static pieces. 
 
Is there a way to restrict the optimizer to not allow reforge/regem on just those 2 specific items? 
 
I know it must be in there somewhere, but I can't seem to find it... maybe I am just wording my issue/documentation/google queries, but I am just not having any luck!
 
Thanks in advance :)
WorkItem.Summary: Restrict specific items from being reforged
